title: Chris Rock Oscars, Buffalo Calls, Biden Speech, Tijuana Tunnel and more.
itunes:title: Chris Rock Oscars, Buffalo Calls, Biden Speech, Tijuana Tunnel and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride!  Steve has some sentences and four letter words for you.  The CLO got a sucker punch in line for someone.  You know Anotonio Brown has a problem when people are saying Kanye got mo' sense than him.  Steve is angered and we get phone calls that trigger the discussions of gun control and white privilege.  Memorial Weekend is coming up and Shirley's question for Steve brought back some unpleasant memories that involves a hot car ride with terrible shocks and no comfort package.  Memorial Weekend is coming up and Shirley's question for Steve brought back some unpleasant memories that involves a hot car ride with terrible shocks and no comfort package.  46 stopped by Buffalo to spread the message that white supremacy and hate will not prevail.  A tunnel from Tijuana to San Diego was discovered.  This round of Would You Rather should not surprise you.  Today in Closing Remarks, Steve shares with us his idea of retirement and the three things on his bucket list.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
